CAREER SUMMARY
2015 to date BRB International
Position: Technical Sales Manager Personal Care
Commercial responsibility for South Europe;
Technical service in Europe, LatAm and USA: troubleshooting, training sales force.
Project management
In-Cosmetics concept coordination: marketing idea, formula design, communication;
New product development: target market unmet needs, close work with R&D, Q&C and production to successfully launch;
Formulation and technical labwork
Distributors and Customers Seminars organization
2011 to 2015 Bluestar Silicones
Position: Technical Service Personal Care
Promotion of product range & after sales service
Coordinate industrial trials and labwork: formulation & performance tests
Staff management: effectively manage a team with leadership; problem solving skills
2010 to 2011 PUIG, PAYOT Brand
Position: R&D Chemist
Formulation and product development on Skincare
Microbiology
COMMENT
10 years of International experience in the Personal Care industry. Being specialized in cosmetic formulation, she has the expertise to hit target sales by providing the right technical support. With demonstrated ability to create long-term and trusting relationship with key customers.
Core skills
Focus Oriented
Strong communication Skills
Time efficiency
Highly organized
Ability to adapt into multicultural environments
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
